purawidya upadeshaka sabhawe samajika pujya ellawala medhananda himi, purawidya upadeshaka sabhawe samajika ruwanwali chaithyadhikari purawidya wisheshawedi pujya pallegama hemarathana himi, purawidya upadeshaka sabhawe samajika pujya oomare kassapa himi, purawidya adhyaksha janaral aacharya senarath disanayaka, madhyama sanskruthika aramudale adhyaksha janaral purawidya mahacharya gamini adhikari, hitapu purawidya komasaris ha madhyama sanskruthika aramudale adhyaksha janaral aacharya roland silwa, peradeniya wishwawidyalaye hitapu purawidya mahacharya purawidyagnya ji.el. premathilaka, madhyama sanskruthika aramudale hitapu adhyaksha janaral wasthu widyagnya mahacharya nimal silwa, peradeniya wishwawidyalaye injineru pitadhipathi injineru mahacharya em.pi. ranawira, injineru sansthawe hitapu sabhapathi injineru widya jothi gamunu silwa, dumriya departhamenthuwe palam pilibanda hitapu injineru ke.ee.di. nandasena, shri lanka purawidyagnyayange sangamaye hitapu sabhapathi ha abhayagiri wyapruthiye purawidya adhyaksha mahacharya ji.ti. kulathunga, lanka purawidyagnyayange sangamaye hitapu sabhapathi ha hitapu purawidya adhyaksha janaral aacharya shiran daraniyagala, madhyama sanskruthika aramudale ha purawidya departhamenthuwe hitapu adhyaksha janaral aacharya dabliyu.

niyojya amathi thanathuru labadimedi namal rajapaksha manthrithuma pradarshanaya kala parinathabhawaya pilibanda ethumata shri lanka nidahas pakshayeth, eksath janatha nidahas sandhanayeth wishesha sthuthiya pirinamana bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye bhandagarika, amathi dalas alahapperuma mahatha prakasha karayi.yauwana katayuthu ha nipunatha sanwardhana amathyansha shrawanagarayedi pereda (12) pawathi wishesha madhya hamuwedi amathyawaraya me bawa prakasha kaleya.niyojya amathyawarun thora ganima sidu karana ladde shri lanka nidahas pakshaya pramukha sandhanaya niyojanaya karana wishesha kamituwakin.

deshiya ha jathyanthara washayen kumana andame mathawada godanangimata wiruddha parshwa prayathna daruwada this wasaraka yuddhayakata madiwa thibu uthurata samaya udakara palath sabha mathiwaranayak pawathwimata hakiwima samastha shri lankika jathiya labu jayagrahanayak bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaya awadharanaya karayi.me nisama uthure mathiwaranayak pawathwima sambandhayen paksha wipaksha bedayen thorawa siyalu dena sathutata pathwiya yuthu bawa ema pakshaye nayakayo awadharanaya karathi.shri lanka nidahas paksha nayakayange sahabhagithwayen ema paksha mulasthana nawa shrawanagaraye eeye (19) pawathwu madhya hamuwedi me karunu awadharanaya karini.uthuru palath mathiwaranaya menma madhyama ha wayambaa palath sabha mathiwarana da labana sapthambar masadi pawathwimata niyamitha bawath, yuddhaya awasan kara ratata samaya uda kala paridden ema mathiwarana siyalla da nidahas, sadharana, apakshapathi ha yukthigaruka andamin pawathwana bawata rajaya sahathika wana bawath mehidi adahas dakwu shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam, amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasiya.ranil wikramasinha mahatha el.ti.ti.ee. sanwidhanaya yuddhayakin parajaya kala nohaki bawa piliganimin prabhakaran samanga giwisumak assan kara rajaye ha el.ti.ti.ee.
